property.name: Rules
property.value: KO any number of characters in your ring. Gain 5 SP for each character KOed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Characters in your ring can receive any number of back-ups this turn, even characters that entered the ring this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raise a character's BP 300 points.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your discard pile.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO a character in your ring. Deals damage to a character equal to KOed character's BP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO all backed-up characters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO a character in your ring. Deals 300 damage points to all characters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deals 300 damage points to a character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then put your discards into your hand. At the end of your turn, discard your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a character card with an ability. An enemy character gets a copy of that ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard an action card. All cards in your hand become that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A frozen enemy character doesn't unfreeze during enemy's next Activate phase.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO a character in your ring and an enemy character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deals 500 damage points to enemy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mimics the effect of an action card not named Emulate from enemy's discard pile.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deals 100 damage points to enemy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return a character in your ring to its controller's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Copy a £ ability from a character. Another character gets that ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Select a character in your ring and an enemy character, then KO all other characters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unfreeze all characters in your ring.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This turn and enemy's next turn, characters can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 500 HP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deals 300 damage points to enemy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO any number of characters in your ring. Draw a card for each character KOed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reduces each player's SP to 0.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The BP of each character become 200.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard your hand. Set aside five cards from your discard pile. Swap your deck with your discard pile, then shuffle your deck and put the cards set aside this way on the top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Characters in your ring don't freeze after a solo or united attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player reveals his hand, then draws a card for each action card revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle all the cards in your hand into your deck, then draw the same number of cards plus one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your deck for an action card, reveal it, then shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deals 500 damage points to all characters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top three cards of any deck, then put them on the top or the bottom of that deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Select a character and reveal the top card of enemy's deck. If that card is a character card, that character's BP become the same as that card. Otherwise, KO that character. Put that card on the top of enemy's deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player reveals his hand, then discards all non character cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO all characters with BP 400 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return a character in your ring and an enemy character to their controllers' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put the top three cards of enemy's deck into his discard pile.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The player with most cards in hand discards them, then draws cards equal to the other player hand size.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 5 SP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unfreeze a frozen character, or freeze a character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO a character in your ring. Gain HP equal to that character's BP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return a character to its controller's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take another turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a character card from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player reveals a card from his hand. If your revealed card has more SP than the card revealed by the enemy, look at his hand and select a card from it, then put that card into your hand. Otherwise, discard the card you revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard your hand, then draw 5 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all characters to their controllers' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO all characters with BP 500 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Select a character. Look through the top of enemy's deck until you reveal a character card. If you do, selected character becomes that card. Put the cards revealed this way on the top of enemy's deck in any order. (It loses his back-ups.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle up to three cards from your discard pile into your deck. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raise the BP of all characters in your ring 200 points.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO all characters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have played a character this turn, you may play an additional character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at enemy's hand. Select a card from it, then enemy discards that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player reveals his hand, then discards all character cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put an action card from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swap the abilities of two characters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a character card with an ability. A character in your ring gets a copy of that ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card from enemy's deck, then enemy draws a card from your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, double united attacks cost 0 SP and triple united attacks cost 5 SP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one: — Deals 300 damage points to enemy. — Gain 500 HP. — Raise the BP of all characters in your ring 200 points.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All characters lose their abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raises a character's BP 100 points for each character card in your discard pile with BP 300 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deals 300 damage points to a character for each backed-up character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 100 HP for each card in enemy's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 500 HP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return any number of characters in your ring to their controllers' hands. Draw a card for each character returned this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, whenever a character counter-attacks a united attack, prevent piercing damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a character card with an ability. A character in your ring gets a copy of that ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO all attacking characters with BP 800 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO a character in your ring. A character's BP become same as KOed character's BP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enemy draws three cards. Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kill any number of character cards in your discard pile. Gain 1 SP for each card killed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO any number of characters in your ring. Deals 300 damage points to all characters for each character KOed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: KO a character in a united attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle all reaction cards from your discard pile into your deck. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put all reaction cards from your discard pile into your hand. At the end of turn, discard all reaction cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Freeze a non attacking character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards for each attacking character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have no characters in your ring, attacking characters deal no damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Two or more attacking characters are forced to do a united attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enemy discards two card at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raise 500 points the BP of all characters with BP 300 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard two cards. Raise a character's BP 500 points.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unfreeze all characters in your ring.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a character card. Gain SP equal to that card's absolute SP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Steals an ability from a character. Another character gets that ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deals 300 damage points to a character.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at enemy's hand. For each reaction card in his hand, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enemy loses 5 SP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard two cards. Deals 300 damage points to all characters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swap the abilities of two characters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at enemy's hand. Enemy discards all non character cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a reaction card. Draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a character card. Deals damage to an attacking character equal to discarded card's BP.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Raise a character's BP 300 points

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remove all attacking characters from attack if you don't counter-attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your deck for a card, then shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The player with fewer cards in hand discards them, then draws cards equal to other player hand size.
